--- editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # AIP Plan {#care-aip} Advance Investment Payment Spend Plan ## Description The Advance Investment Payment Spend Plan data provides payment use, spending category, projected and actual spending of advanced investments payments by Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs). ### Metadata ::: {.cell} 
[1] "The Advance Investment Payment Spend Plan data provides payment use, spending category, projected and actual spending of advanced investments payments by Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs)."
